prompt: As a house of one. Will I still be receiving my recruiting cost if I joined another company or will I be removed from bld system?
completion: You will be able to receive your recruiting cost even if you decide to join another company, as long as you remain in good standing with bld.ai. If you are no longer in good standing, you may be removed from the bld system.

prompt: Can I continue to work with bld.ai if I am part of a larger house?
completion: If you are part of a larger house, you can still work with bld.ai as long as you remain in good standing. Good standing is not yet defined, but some initial ideas for meeting the requirements include contributing to successful sales, maintaining positive relationships with bld.ai workers, and charging 4 hours of work per month.

prompt: What happens if I don't meet the good standing requirements with bld.ai?
completion: Regardless of whether you are a house of one or part of a larger house, as long as you remain in good standing with bld.ai, you will continue to receive commissions. Good standing is still being defined, but initial ideas for meeting the requirements include contributing to successful sells or hires, maintaining a positive relationship with bld.ai workers, and charging at least 4 hours of work per month.

prompt: How is 'good standing' with bld.ai defined?
completion: Good standing with bld.ai means meeting certain requirements that are still being defined. Some initial ideas for meeting the requirements include charging at least 4 hours of work per month, contributing to successful hires or sales, and maintaining a positive relationship with other bld.ai workers.

prompt: What are the starter ideas for meeting the 'good standing' requirements with bld.ai?
completion: As a worker, regardless of whether you are a house of one or part of a larger house, as long as you remain in good standing with bld.ai, you will continue to receive commissions. Good standing is not defined yet, but initial ideas for meeting the requirement include charging at least 4 hours of work per month and contributing to successful sales and hires.
